page.title: 07FARMS AROUND WILLAND
page.content: {GERSTON FARM }(CONTINUED FROM PAGE 6) THE FARM HOUSE HAS 11 BIG ROOMS IT WAS BUILT 550 YEARS AGO.{ MACHINES USED} TRACTOR, BAILER, HAY TURNER, BONUR SPREADER, FERTILIZER SPREADER, HARVESTER, PLOUGH, GRAIN GRINDER AND TRAILERS. {HARPPIT HOUSE FARM }VISITED BY VICTORIA BALAAM, LINDSEY WHIPP AND KATIE WHITCOMBE. THE FARM IS RUN BY MR J WEBBER. HE OWNS 10 PIGS, 10 SHEEP, 5 COWS AND HE ALSO LETS OTHER PEOPLE PUT ANIMALS ON HIS LAND. MOST OF THE CROPS HE GROWS ARE GRASS, CORN AND POTATOES. HE HAS 47.5 HECTARES OF GRASSLAND AND 44 HECTARES OF WOODLAND. HE COMES FROM A FARMING FAMILY AND HAS LIVED IN THE VILLAGE FOR 30 YEARS. HE LIKES FEEDING AND CARING FOR THE ANIMALS BEST.THE BUSY TIME OF THE YEAR IS THE LAMBING SEASON. THIS YEAR THEY FEED 4 LAMBS WITH A BOTTLE.THE FARM IS 300YEARS OLD
